actions.committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

official_title: To amend title I of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to provide that any participant or beneficiary under an employee benefit plan shall be entitled to de novo review in court of benefit determinations under such plan.

summary.text: Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 (ERISA) to entitle any participant or beneficiary under an employee benefit plan to de novo review in court of benefit determinations under such plan.

titles.title: To amend title I of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to provide that any participant or beneficiary under an employee benefit plan shall be entitled to de novo review in court of benefit determinations under such plan.
